Description: - Added a hero based mmr system, so when you join a match with a specific hero the matchmaker adjusts the skill level it assumes you are at by a percentage up or down based on your experience and performance levels with that hero.
- Added settings option to allow weapon zoom to be a toggle
- Added a game volume slider which will control volume independently from voice chat (VoIP)
- {{Icon|General}} General improvements to voice chat quality
- Non-matchmaking lobbies are now considered safe to abandon
- Crates now show the amount of souls they have in the tooltip
- Greater contrast between team and enemy sounds
- Updated headshot hit indicator
- Updated {{Icon|McGinnis}} McGinnis weapon sounds
- Updated {{Icon|Vindicta}} Vindicta weapon sounds
- Updated {{Icon|Lady Geist}} Lady Geist weapon sounds
- Fixed a bug where pinging {{Icon|Bebop}} Bebop's {{Icon|Hook}} Hook and {{Icon|Sticky Bomb}} Sticky Bomb abilities would call the wrong ability name
- Fixed a recent bug with {{Icon|Metal Skin}} Metal Skin that caused you to do zero bullet damage
- Fixed a bug with releasing {{Icon|Grey Talon}} Grey Talon's Owl early
- Updated {{Icon|Dynamo}} Dynamo's animation while using {{Icon|Rejuvenating Aurora}} Rejuvenating Aurora
- Fixed a bug that could allow {{Icon|Grey Talon}} Grey Talon to hit the same target multiple times when close during {{Icon|Rain of Arrows}} Rain of Arrows
- Fixed a bug that could cause button input detection to malfunction
- Fixed an issue where the Rejuvenator being stolen was firing incorrectly
- Fixed a bug introduced in last week's update that caused gun spreads to not work properly
- Added an effect at the bottom of a player's screen whenever they are standing on something that causes damage
- Improved {{Icon|Abrams}} Abrams animation while hovering in the air during his ultimate and adjusted the downward acceleration animation
- Flex slot removed from killing the Patron and added to killing all Walkers
- Urn now spawns on both sides of the map. Bounty for each is reduced by 40%
- Rejuvenator now reduces players' next respawn time by 75% instead of giving a 3s respawn time
- Golden Statues no longer drop powerups (time duration buffs). Instead they now drop small permanent bonuses. These stack and do not decay with time or death. Drop rates rebalanced.
+2 Spirit
+1.5% Fire Rate
+3% Ammo
+15 Max HP (this has slightly higher odds of dropping than the others)
+0.5% Cooldown Reduction
+2% Weapon Damage
- At defined locations around the map, powerups now spawn starting 10 minutes (and every 5 minutes after). There are 6 spots where they spawn and they are indicated on the minimap when they are up.
- Movement powerup duration increased from 30s to 50s
- Fire Rate powerup duration increased from 35s to 45s and +15% Fire Rate to +18%
- Regeneration powerup duration increased from 25s to 45s
- Stamina powerup duration increased from 80s to 120s
- Cooldown powerup is unchanged
- Clip powerup is unchanged
- Breakables initial spawn time increased from 2 min to 3 min
- Fixed being able to hide inside the Guardian's head
- Jumping after a dash jump no longer causes your hero to sometimes jump in place
- Breakables souls base value reduced by 30%. Increases to +15% of current values over 30 minutes. (so -30% to +15% from start to 30 min)
- All hero guns' reload time reduced by 5%
- Zipline Boost ability cooldown reduced from 380s to 340s
- Medic Trooper heal now bounces to up to one other allied hero within 25m from the hero
- Trooper gold sharing radius from the location of the allied hero reduced from 50m to 40m
- Creep waves now land at their lane destinations at the same time as each other
- Added connection hallway between outer lane Shop and crate room
- Opened up Authority Building and Jazz Club to the Guardian side
- Added intermediate cover in front of Amber Orange Guardian and Sapphire Blue Guardian
- Added Veils to entrances to base fountain
- Extended cover near Sapphire Orange Guardian to match Amber Blue
- Extended alcove on outer lane cover position in front of the Shop
- Underground tunnels have more light
- Removed underground tunnel alcoves
- Added signs for entrance to the underground tunnel from the warehouse side
- CD reduction increased from +7% to +8%
- Active Spirit Power increased from +12 to +18
- Now a Spirit {{Icon|Item}} Item
- No longer grants +20% Fire Rate for 4s on Soul Secure/Deny
- Now grants +3 Spirit for 18s on Soul Secure/Deny. Multiple instances stack and refresh the duration. Max 12 stacks.
- Spirit bonus increased from +7 to +8
- Health increased from +135 to +140
- Cooldown reduced from 80s to 75s
- Fire Rate increased from +20% to +22%
- Timing window to click increased from 0.2s to 0.3s
- Active {{Icon|Bullet Lifesteal}} Bullet Lifesteal increased from 30% to 40%
- Duration increased from 6s to 8s
- Weapon Damage increased from 8% to 10%
- Weapon Damage increased from 10% to 15%
- Ammo increased from +15% to +20%
- Increased from 20% to 22%
- Spirit Shield Health reduced from +500 to +200
- Now grants +400 Bullet Shield Health
- Max stacks increased from 18 to 20
- Health increased from +50 to +75
- Ability Duration reduced from 18% to 16%
- Healing Reduction improved from -65% to -70%
- Bleed increased from 2.4% to 2.6%
- Ammo increased from 15% to 20%
- Now grants +4 Spirit
- Fire Rate reduction reduced from -35% to -30%
- Fire Rate reduction reduced from -35% to -30%
- Ammo increased from +75% to +90%
- Stack duration increased from 10s to 14s
- Cooldown reduced from 9s to 8s
- Slide Distance increased from 25% to 35%
- Max DPS increased from 85 to 95
- Cooldown reduced from 30s to 28s
- Weapon Damage increased from +12% to +14%
- Distance increased from 12m to 13m
- Bullet Shield health increased from +200 to +225
- Now provides +16% {{Icon|Bullet Lifesteal}} Bullet Lifesteal
- No longer grants a 10% Fire Rate Aura
- Active now grants +20% Fire Rate instead of {{Icon|Bullet Lifesteal}} Bullet Lifesteal
- Slow duration increased from 2s to 2.5s
- Imbued Ability Spirit Power increased from +20 to +24
- Duration increased from 3s to 3.5s
- Post-cast bonus is now still granted when ending the buff early
- Health increased from +100 to +125
- Now grants +4 Health Regen
- Weapon Damage reduced from 25% to 20%
- Debuff duration reduced from 8s to 5s
- Bonus spirit increased from +40 to +45
- Fire Rate increased from +15% to +20%
- Whenever you go back above 40%, the buff lingers for 4s
- Ammo increased from +7 to +9
- Cooldown reduced from 30s to 24s
- Max HP Steal duration increased from 12s to 15s
- Now grants +8% Weapon Damage
- Radius increased from 10m to 12m
- Cooldown reduced from 12s to 8s
- {{Icon|Quantum Entanglement}} Quantum Entanglement is prevented from being cast when {{Icon|Dynamo}} Dynamo is rooted or movement-silenced (such as by {{Icon|Slowing Hex}} Slowing Hex)
- {{Icon|Rejuvenating Aurora}} Rejuvenating Aurora T3 reduced from +5% to +4%
- {{Icon|Bullet Dance}} Bullet Dance T1 increased from +5 Weapon Damage to +6
- Fixed various bugs with the fire rate on {{Icon|Bullet Dance}} Bullet Dance (net effect of the bugs was that it often fired a little faster than it was intended to)
- {{Icon|Afterburn}} Afterburn base dps reduced from 20 to 18
- {{Icon|Afterburn}} Afterburn T3 reduced from +35 to +33
- {{Icon|Arctic Beam}} Arctic Beam spirit scaling increased from 0.7 to 0.9
- {{Icon|Arctic Beam}} Arctic Beam cooldown reduced from 25 to 23
- {{Icon|Ground Strike}} Ground Strike radius reduced from 14m to 13m
- {{Icon|Death Slam}} Death Slam radius reduced from 20m to 19m
- Fixed her gun having a recent regression that caused it to not have any spread
- {{Icon|Mini Turret}} Mini Turret damage reduced by up to 30% at 35m (now has bullet falloff from 20m to 35m)
- {{Icon|Mini Turret}} Mini Turret deploy time reduced from 2s to 1s
- {{Icon|Mini Turret}} Mini Turret now shows up on the minimap
- Medicinal Spectre can no longer be attacked
- {{Icon|Spectral Wall}} Spectral Wall height increased by 2m
- {{Icon|Spectral Wall}} Spectral Wall slow duration increased from 2s to 2.5s
- Fixed a bug with {{Icon|Spectral Wall}} Spectral Wall that caused the Rejuvenator to instantly drop
- Base HP regen increased from 2.5 to 3
- {{Icon|Scorn}} Scorn damage increased from 50 to 60
- Fixed {{Icon|Scorn}} Scorn not healing for more with things like {{Icon|Mystic Burst}} Mystic Burst
- {{Icon|Burrow}} Burrow now destroys breakables in its path
- Fixed {{Icon|Healing Booster}} Healing Booster not applying to {{Icon|Scorn}} Scorn's 2x heal multiplier on heroes
- Added a bonus counter to show how much health has been earned by getting a kill during {{Icon|Combo}} Combo
- Base movement speed reduced from 7 to 6.5
- {{Icon|Kinetic Carbine}} Kinetic Carbine impact radius reduced by 15%
- {{Icon|Kinetic Carbine}} Kinetic Carbine Max Stop Duration reduced from 0.75 to 0.5
- {{Icon|Kinetic Carbine}} Kinetic Carbine buff duration reduced from 6 to 4
- {{Icon|Kinetic Carbine}} Kinetic Carbine T1 increased from +0.5s Max Stop Duration to +0.75
- {{Icon|Kinetic Carbine}} Kinetic Carbine T2 now also increases buff by +2s
- {{Icon|Paradox}} {{Icon|Paradoxical Swap}} Paradoxical Swap range reduced from 35m to 30m
- {{Icon|Enchanter's Satchel}} Enchanter's Satchel can now be canceled by shooting
- Fixed {{Icon|Return Fire}} Return Fire working with {{Icon|Power Surge}} Power Surge
- No longer has base +15% Spirit Resistance
- Now has base +20% Bullet Resistance
- Base health regen reduced from 2 to 1
- {{Icon|Static Charge}} Static Charge T1 improved from -15s Cooldown to -20s
- Base movement speed increased from 7 to 8
- Fixed {{Icon|Crow Familiar}} Crow Familiar T1 only bouncing to 1 additional target instead of 2
- {{Icon|Assassinate}} Assassinate zoom level is reduced a bit
- {{Icon|Willpower}} Willpower no longer loses movement speed when the shield is depleted
- {{Icon|Willpower}} Willpower duration reduced from 8s to 7s

- The {{Icon|Royal Flush}} Royal Flush ability has been replaced with {{Icon|Card Trick}} Card Trick. {{Icon|Card Trick}} Card Trick enables {{Icon|Wraith}} Wraith's weapon damage to summon playing cards. Activating the ability throws one of the cards, which will fly towards the enemy or point under the crosshair and explode on impact.
- {{Icon|Power Slash}} Power Slash damage reduced from 175 to 170
- Can now cancel {{Icon|Flying Strike}} Flying Strike
- {{Icon|Shadow Transformation}} Shadow Transformation damage and debuff resistance reduced from 80% to 70%
- {{Icon|Shadow Transformation}} Shadow Transformation duration increased from 4.5s to 5s
